Package motedata

Web Service for Getting Mote Information.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ColumnHeader Table column header.
MoteData Service class for getting mote data.
SimpleTable Simple data table.
 

Package motedata Description

Web Service for Getting Mote Information.

This web service provides clients with a method to get status and other information about motes in the testbed. Clients can use this information to present the user with mote attributes about mote availability, MAC address, etc. Information about all motes is returned and there are no possibilities for the client to set limits, for example on the number of motes from which to have results.

Clients are required to pass their session ID in order to allow the web service to list client specific information, such as mote availability and status, correctly.

Clients should make as few assumptions about the result as possible, since it can contain mote attributes unknown to the client. It can use the various meta data information on each attribute by inspecting the associated ColumnHeader.
